sentences.sContent: Objective: To observe the effect of theophylline on the induced sputum cytology of asthma.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: To observe the effect of theophylline on the induced sputum cytology of asthma.
sentences.sCn: 目的：观察茶碱对哮喘患者诱导痰细胞学的影响。

sentences.sContent: Tea contains, in addition to caffeine, small amounts of two other methyl xanthines, theobromine and theophylline, 3, 7 - dimethy1 and 1, 3 - dimethy1 xanthine , respectively.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tea contains, in addition to caffeine, small amounts of two other methyl xanthines, theobromine and theophylline, 3, 7 - dimethy1 and 1, 3 - dimethy1 xanthine , respectively.
sentences.sCn: 茶除了含咖啡因以外，还含有少量的另外两种甲基黄酮嘌呤，即可可堿和茶堿，它们分别是3 ， 7 -二甲基黄嘌呤和1 ， 3 -二甲基黄嘌呤。

trans.tranOther: a white crystalline slightly water-soluble alkaloid that is an isomer of theobromine: it occurs in plants, such as tea, and is used to treat asthma
